Mohamed Tahar Fergani (9 Mee 1928 7 Disemba 2016) bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwu, onye na-akpọ violin na onye na-ede egwu, nke a na-akpọ Nightingale nke Constantine
Nna ukwu nke egwu Malouf nke Constantine
Mohamed Tahar Fergani bụ otu n'ime ndị na-agụ egwú ole na ole na-akọwa ihe ndị e dere na octaves anọ
Na mgbakwunye Malouf, ọ na-akọwa Mahjouz (ụdị Constantinois a ma ama nke sitere na MalouF), Zjoul (ụdị egwu dị ka Malouf), constantinois) na Hawzi (ụdị a ma ama sitere na Tlemcen Gharnati).
Nna ya Hamou Fergani bụ onye na-agụ egwu nke Hawzi
Mohamed Tahar malitere na egwu ọwụwa anyanwụ, o mechara gbanwee ụdị na-eru nso Malouf
Ndị isi ya abụọ bụ Cheîkh Hassouna na Cheîkh Baba Abid
Ndị Malouf na-ewere ndị Ferganies nke ukwuu
Nwanne ya nwanyị Z'hor bụkwa onye na-agụ egwu ebe nwa ya nwoke Salim bụkwa onye cheîkh nke Malouf a ma ama
Mohamed Tahar nwere ọtụtụ narị ndekọ ma natakwa ọtụtụ onyinye mba ụwa
O mepụtara Orchestra ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ ya nke Constantine
Otu n'ime abụ ya a maara na Algeria "Ed Dhalma" (onye na-ezighị ezi) nke onye na-ede uri, Henni Bengenoune
Ọ nwụrụ na Paris mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na asatọ na 7 Disemba 2016.
